Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.abstract: Sign out the given user session.

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.name: getThemes(completion:)

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.name: getDetails(forThread:completion:)

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.name: getReplies(forThread:orderedBy:page:completion:)
Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.abstract: Fetch the replies for the given thread id.

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.name: postReply(inThread:withComment:completion:)
Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.abstract: Post a new reply to the given thread id and return the newly created reply id.

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.name: search(forThread:completion:)
Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.abstract: Fetch a list of threads matching the search query.

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.abstract: Lock or unlock a thread with the given thread id.

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.name: register(withUsername:emailAddress:password:profileImage:completion:)
Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.abstract: Register a new account with the given details.

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.name: register(withAppleUserID:emailAddress:completion:)
Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.abstract: Register a new account and sign in using the details from Sign in with Apple.

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.name: signInWithApple(usingIDToken:authorizationCode:completion:)
Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.abstract: Sign in users to their account using Sign in with Apple.

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.name: resetPassword(withEmailAddress:completion:)
Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.abstract: Request a password reset link for the given email address.

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.abstract: Update the current user’s profile information.

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.name: getSessions(forUserID:completion:)
Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.abstract: Fetch the list of sessions for the current user.

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.name: getLibrary(forUserID:withLibraryStatus:withSortType:withSortOption:completion:)
Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.abstract: Fetch the list of shows with the given show status in the current user’s library.

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.name: addToLibrary(forUserID:withLibraryStatus:showID:completion:)
Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.abstract: Add a show with the given show id to the current user’s library.

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.name: removeFromLibrary(forUserID:showID:completion:)
Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.abstract: Remove a show with the given show id from the current user’s library.

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.name: importMALLibrary(forUserID:filePath:importBehavior:completion:)
Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.abstract: Import a MAL export file into the user’s library.

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.abstract: Fetch a list of shows matching the search query in the user’s library.

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.name: getFavourites(forUserID:completion:)
Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.abstract: Fetch the favorite shows list for the given user.

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.name: updateFavoriteStatus(forUserID:forShow:withFavoriteStatus:completion:)
Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.abstract: Update the isFavorite value of a show in the current user’s library.

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.name: restoreDetails(forUserWith:completion:)
Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.abstract: Fetches and restores the details for the current user.

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.name: getProfile(forUserID:completion:)
Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.abstract: Fetch the profile details of the given user id.

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.abstract: Fetch the list of notifications for the current user.

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.abstract: Fetch a list of users matching the search query.

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.abstract: Follow or unfollow a user with the given user id.

Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.name: getFollowList(_:_:page:completion:)
Classes/KurozoraKit.html#/s:11KurozoraKi.abstract: Fetch the followers or following list for the current user.

Classes/KurozoraKit.html.name: KurozoraKit
Classes/KurozoraKit.html.abstract: KurozoraKit is a root object that serves as a provider for single API endpoint. It is used to send and get data from Kurozora.

Classes/KKServices.html.name: KKServices
Classes/KKServices.html.abstract: KKServices is the object that serves as a provider for KurozoraKit services.

Classes/BadgeElement.html.name: BadgeElement
Classes/BadgeElement.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single badge, such as the badge’s name, description, and text color.

Classes/Actors.html.name: Actors
Classes/Actors.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a collection of actors, such as the total actor count, and a collection of actors.

Classes/ActorsElement.html.name: ActorsElement
Classes/ActorsElement.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single actor, such as the actor’s name, role, and image.

Classes/Episodes.html.name: Episodes
Classes/Episodes.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a collection of episodes, such as the episodes’ season.

Classes/EpisodesElement.html.name: EpisodesElement
Classes/EpisodesElement.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single episode, such as the episodes’s number, name, and air date.

Classes/EpisodesUserDetails.html.name: EpisodesUserDetails
Classes/EpisodesUserDetails.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single user’s details, such as the watch status of the episode.

Classes/EpisodesSeason.html.name: EpisodesSeason
Classes/EpisodesSeason.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about an episode’s season, such as the season’s title, and episode count.

Classes/Explore.html.name: Explore
Classes/Explore.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a collection of explore categories.

Classes/ExploreCategory.html.name: ExploreCategory
Classes/ExploreCategory.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single explore category, such as the category’s title, size, and collection of shows.

Classes/FavoriteShow.html.name: FavoriteShow
Classes/FavoriteShow.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a show’s favorite status.

Classes/FeedPosts.html.name: FeedPosts
Classes/FeedPosts.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a collection of feed posts, such as the feed’s total pages count.

Classes/FeedPostElement.html.name: FeedPostElement
Classes/FeedPostElement.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single feed post, such as the posts’s content, creation date, and share count.

Classes/FeedSections.html.name: FeedSections
Classes/FeedSections.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a collection of feed sections.

Classes/FeedSectionsElement.html.name: FeedSectionsElement
Classes/FeedSectionsElement.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single feed section, such as the section’s name, and lock status.

Classes/ForumsSections.html.name: ForumsSections
Classes/ForumsSections.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a collection of forums sections.

Classes/ForumsSectionsElement.html.name: ForumsSectionsElement
Classes/ForumsSectionsElement.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single feed section, such as the sections’s name, and lock status.

Classes/ForumsThread.html.name: ForumsThread
Classes/ForumsThread.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single forums thread, such as the thred’s last page number, and collection of threads it contains.

Classes/ForumsThreadElement.html.name: ForumsThreadElement
Classes/ForumsThreadElement.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single forums thread, such as the thread’s title, content, and lock status.

Classes/Genres.html.name: Genres
Classes/Genres.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a collection of genres.

Classes/GenreElement.html.name: GenreElement
Classes/GenreElement.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single genre, such as the genre’s name, color, and symbol.

Classes/KKError.html.name: KKError
Classes/KKError.html.abstract: An immutable object that stores information about a single failed request, such as the error message.

Classes/KKSuccess.html.name: KKSuccess
Classes/KKSuccess.html.abstract: An immutable object that stores information about a single successful request, such as the success message.

Classes/MALImport.html.name: MALImport
Classes/MALImport.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single import request, such as the import’s message status.

Classes/PrivacyPolicy.html.name: PrivacyPolicy
Classes/PrivacyPolicy.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single privacy policy object.

Classes/PrivacyPolicyElement.html.name: PrivacyPolicyElement
Classes/PrivacyPolicyElement.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single privacy policy, such as the policy’s text, and last updated date.

Classes/Search.html.name: Search
Classes/Search.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a collection of search results.

Classes/Seasons.html.name: Seasons
Classes/Seasons.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a collection of seasons.

Classes/SeasonsElement.html.name: SeasonsElement
Classes/SeasonsElement.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single season, such as the season’s title, number, and episodes count.

Classes/UserSessions.html.name: UserSessions
Classes/UserSessions.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a collection of user sessions, such as the current session, and a collection of other sessions.

Classes/UserSessionsElement.html.name: UserSessionsElement
Classes/UserSessionsElement.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single user session, such as the session’s ip address, last validated date, and platform.

Classes/LocationElement.html.name: LocationElement
Classes/LocationElement.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single location, such as the location’s region, latitude, and longitude.

Classes/PlatformElement.html.name: PlatformElement
Classes/PlatformElement.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single platform, such as the platform’s system name, version, and device vendor.

Classes/ShowDetails.html.name: ShowDetails
Classes/ShowDetails.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a collection of shows.

Classes/ShowDetailsElement.html.name: ShowDetailsElement
Classes/ShowDetailsElement.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single show, such as the show’s title, episode count, and air date.

Classes/Themes.html.name: Themes
Classes/Themes.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a collection of themes.

Classes/ThemesElement.html.name: ThemesElement
Classes/ThemesElement.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single theme, such as the theme’s name, download count, and download link.

Classes/ThreadPost.html.name: ThreadPost
Classes/ThreadPost.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single thread post.

Classes/ThreadReplies.html.name: ThreadReplies
Classes/ThreadReplies.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a collection of thread replies, such as the thread reply’s current page, last page, and total pages count.

Classes/ThreadRepliesElement.html.name: ThreadRepliesElement
Classes/ThreadRepliesElement.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single thread reply, such as the reply’s content, and score.

Classes/ThreadReply.html.name: ThreadReply
Classes/ThreadReply.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single thread reply.

Classes/User.html.name: User
Classes/User.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single user, such as the user’s profile, and authentication token.

Classes/CurrentUser.html.name: CurrentUser
Classes/CurrentUser.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about the current user, such as the current user’s username, bio, and session.

Classes/UserProfile.html.name: UserProfile
Classes/UserProfile.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about the user profile, such as the user’s username, bio, and session.

Classes/UserFollow.html.name: UserFollow
Classes/UserFollow.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a collection of follow lists, such as the follow list’s current page number, and last page number.

Classes/UserNotification.html.name: UserNotification
Classes/UserNotification.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a collection of notifications.

Classes/UserNotificationsElement.html.name: UserNotificationsElement
Classes/UserNotificationsElement.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single notification, such as the notification’s type, read status, and containing data.

Classes/UserNotificationData.html.name: UserNotificationData
Classes/UserNotificationData.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single notification type data.

Classes/VoteThread.html.name: VoteThread
Classes/VoteThread.html.abstract: A mutable object that stores information about a single thread/reply vote, such as the vote’s status.
